Key Arguments: The draft amendment bill does not achieve a balance between combatting misinformation and protecting freedom of speech.
There is ambiguity in who determines what constitutes misinformation and disinformation.
The definitions of misinformation and disinformation in the bill are confusing and lack clarity.
Concerns about government and professional news outlets being exempt from misinformation and disinformation regulations.
The bill could hinder freedom of expression and speech.
The potential for government overreach and control over speech.
